data.text: @jkwan_md Do you live in Ontario and support rights, freedoms and social justice?  Apply to be a candidate for the 2022 Ontario election here - https://t.co/s8NqvNYRVM
@jkwan_md @JBPVFM I really follow the positivity data. I come three times a week to check.

@jkwan_md @miki_fern My family has been dealing with Covid after my son got it from school - the only place he’s been.  Positive tests and no place to report them. Called my doctor to find next steps and was told to ride it out unless it becomes an emergency. 🤷🏻‍♀️
@jkwan_md So, not time to remove all masks and vaccine passports ?

@jkwan_md @JBPVFM I know more people now in the last 2 weeks that have covid due to rapid tests, but alas these are not included in data. It seems public health is just saying deal assume you have it and deal with it!
@jkwan_md @COVIDSciOntario Yeah it’s that slight uptick projected that worries me… BA.2 incoming as well.
@jkwan_md This is all excellent work. Thank you
